original_text: But if he already decided to kill the other person, he is a murderer. You must punish him with death. Even if he runs to my altar as a safe place, take him away from there and kill him.
korean_text: 사람이 그의 이웃을 고의로 죽였으면 너는 그를 내 제단에서라도 잡아내려 죽일지니라

sentences.original_text: But if he already decided to kill the other person
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그가 이미 다른 사람을 죽이기로 결심했다면

sentences.original_text: You must punish him with death
Even if he runs to my altar as a safe place
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 안전한 곳으로 내 제단으로 도망치더라도
